DOC.HEADLINE: PERES , ARAFAT RESOLVE THORNY AID ISSUE IN OSLO
DOC.TEXT: Israeli Foreign Minister Shimon Peres and Palestine Liberation Organization Chairman Yasser Arafat resolved the thorny issue of development aid for the Palestinian territories Tuesday . After an afternoon of talks in Oslo , where both men came_to mark the one-year anniversary of the Mideast peace accord , Israeli negotiators said that Arafat had agreed to drop the demand to address Jerusalem ' s status as part of an aid package , according to a preliminary draft of their final statement . Peres and Arafat were meeting privately and with Norwegian and U.N. officials to discuss , among other things , $ 2.3 billion in development aid for the Palestinian territories .
